DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Status Post Date Last Form Occurrence Ind-3b
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A condition or state at a particular time._Post; occuring after._a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out._Occurrence; an instance of something happening._A term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/ and something else.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
A condition or state at a particular time.

Property.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A condition or state at a particular time._A term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/ and something else.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone. (from Merriam-Webster OnLine): An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.: Given.: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:A condition or state at a particular time.:A term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.
